item.title: Chili
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 1 onion, diced
  • 1 pepper, diced
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 4 x 8 ounce cans tomato sauce
  • 1 can black beans
  • 1 can kidney beans
  • 2 tablespoons chili powder
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper

Directions

  1. brown ground beef
  2. combine all ingredients and cook over medium heat
